Title: BERNEY Swiss Mini Pocket WATCH PENDANT Gold Overlay - Engraved Shield
Description: BERNEY Swiss Mini Pocket WATCH PENDANT Gold Overlay - Engraved Shield Swedemom is proud to present this BERNEY Gold Overlay Mini Pocket WATCH PENDANT. One of the premier Swiss watch making families, BERNEY has been manufacturing timepieces of exceptional quality for many years. These exquisite pieces (both CASES and MOVEMENTS) are manufactured and assembled entirely at the factory in La Vallee' de Joux in Switzerland. The white 15mm dial (face) is signed "Berney", "Quartz" and "Swiss Made". It has black Roman numerals, and black hour and minute hands. The 19mm gold overlay case is engraved with a floral pattern.  This Brand New, battery operated watch is an heirloom quality timepiece that will be enjoyed for years to come. Charity.Mission: MacHub is a division of Yamhill County Gospel Rescue Mission. MacHub partners with YCGRM to provide needed shelter, support, hope, and job opportunities. MacHub is changing community fund-raising by facilitating the sale of high-value contributions and passing proceeds on to nonprofits in the community. We thank our supporters and we welcome your ongoing support of our efforts!
